name: hexjumper
text: That's a good trick to get somebody to eat something.

name: deimosrising
text: That day, I had some nutrition. Not most days though.

name: hellofyellin
text: Only a straight up rube rolls without glasses and plates.

name: epicurus
text: This is how I see dinner with my mother going in about ten years.

name: lucid
text: Just being the best damn host, what mother couldn't be proud of a son who makes like she's the guest of honour at a fine establishment, pulling uot all the stops such as plates.

name: dusty
text: When my wife's mom comes over I take her to the Astor Lounge, it's got marble floors, crystal chandeliers and waiters in tuxedos. Of course, now that she knows what I'm up to it's hard to get her out of the car, and she remembers the way back to my house from there.

name: patkun
text: It breaks her heart. She greets her son with weird emotional blackmail.

name: mysterymeat1001
text: So your mother wasn't Catholic, or Jewish.

name: i_love_kate
text: Or female.

name: gouldgonewild
text: A comment left by gouldgonewild was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, Pseudochron, uberbee)

name: gumfish
text: Huh. Well there you go.

name: straw
text: O geez, I just remembered that this is what starts the Great Outdoor Fight arc.  I know what I'm going to be doing for the next hour!

name: ford
text: Right now it is 5:07 in the morning, and I have been telling myself for five strips that i need to go to bed before the words "Great Outdoor Fight" are spoken by Sondra.  I'm pretty sure that happens in the next one, and i don't know if i have the willpower.

name: chetyre
text: So when I finally sat down to look at Achewood, I decided to start at the beginning.  I've read through every strip up to this point, and I am pumped that I will finally see what the Great Outdoor Fight is.

name: wae
text: ray looks weird in a sweater.

name: blarghamagarky
text: I think he looks handsome

name: gmm
text: I'd give it a five for that sweater alone.

name: skellingtonloc
text: It's a weird thing to say, but she really does look like a cat dressed up in human clothes.

name: senseihollywood
text: you can have anything you want...as long as it's a rib-eye and a mimosa

name: dasilodavi
text: Awwwww!!!!

name: mindbnder
text: I was out with a girlfriend, early in our relationship, and we decided to purchase a rib-eye, and I informed her that it is the most nutritious cut of steak.  She did not understand, but I understood that our love was not to be.

name: peterjoel
text: In the Smuckles family, everyone wears glasses in such a manner that you cannot see their eyes.

name: prettyrad
text: I didn't notice that, because it was bugging me that Ray's mum wears her glasses upside-down.

name: spinynorman
text: They have glasses! And plates!

name: waggawagga
text:
I love Ray's little smile in the fifth panel.
He is his mommy's big baby boy.

name: tim_simmons
text: chubbied because i am the same like that

name: fattypneumonia
text: Also chubbied for the avatar of frenetic perpetual motion.

name: dallovich
text: He plays his mother soooo smooth! An example for all of us bachlors who are up to no good, and don't want our mothers to find out!

name: charchar
text:
Rib-eye and mimosas are really the primary diet of Southern matriarchs. Eveything else is just gravy.

In an interesting turn of events, today is Wednesday, and I have had my nutrition. Yay, Nutrition Wednesday!

name: i_love_kate
text: Rib-eye, mimosa and gravy? They must have a hell of a time staving off scurvy.

name: dj_insomniac
text:
Not at all, the Mimosas contain orange juice. It is not only nutritious, but packed with vitamins.

And bubbly stuff.

name: i_love_kate
text:
That's what I get for not properly researching my malnutrition diseases.

...Beri-beri?

name: charchar
text: There is no thiamine to be had in this diet. Beriberi is a distinct possibility. It is a dreadfully sucky way to die .

name: i_love_kate
text: Thank you, GCSE level Geography. That and some glaciation terms are probably the only things I took away from it.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
Quote:
swelling in both lower legs


those are the only ones i have!!
(i say, rewrite that for ease of reading.)

name: foetus_punch
text: It is wednesday, and I have definitely not had any Nutrition. I am wandering through my house and giggling occasionally, and it is 3 AM (Wednesday) and all I have eaten is an entire jar of pickles and some oddly grainy Cherry Garcia ice cream in a container clearly labeled French Vanilla. I didn't eat yesterday.

name: direhaggis
text: I am not dissing Ray's mom, but she bears an uncomfortable resemblance to Dracula in his red outfit thing from Francis Ford Coppola's 1992 make of " Dracula ".

name: excusemesenator
text:
Ray's mom in the last panel reminded me of this:

[IMGS OFF]

name: mattylite
text: Man, that chick looks hot.  Oh no wait, she looks old and hagard.  Oh, no, ok, now she looks hot again.  Oh shit, no, old and hagard!  Hot girl, why don't you look this way . . . aaaaaahhhhh oldddd haagggggaarrrdddddd noooooooo!

name: heccibiggs
text: Uuuunnnhhh I can't see the hot chick what am I doing wrong!

name: heccibiggs
text: Oh wait there she is

name: i_love_kate
text: It helps if you think you're looking for a hot chick who's just had her throat slit.

name: trealnaaqed
text: huh. ray cleans up well.

name: trealnaaqed
text: huh. ray cleans up well.

name: adult_beverages
text: Ribeye is my fave cut of steak, five'd like a mo' fucka

name: duperando
text: holy crap. Sondra Smuckles has TINY feet.

name: stonecrab
text: Most kitties do!
